Mariinsky Orchestra and Chorus, Valery Gergiev (conductor) Ilya Shlepyanov (Stage Direction), Yuri Laptev (Reprise)
Vladislav Sulimsky (Mazepa) Stanislav Trofimov (Kochubei) Ekaterina Semenchuk (Lyubov) Maria Bayankina (Maria)
